price: 29 Franchissez les portes de la Géhenne pour y demeurer éternellement. » Infâme demeure que celle des orgueilleux !
arabic: فَٱدۡخُلُوٓاْ أَبۡوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ فَلَبِئۡسَ مَثۡوَى ٱلۡمُتَكَبِّرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: fa-ud'khulū abwāba jahannama khālidīna fīhā falabi'sa mathwā al-mutakabirīna
